TEXT.TITLE: BISHOP GRAPHICS <BGPH> COMPLETES STORE SALE
TEXT.BODY:
Bishop Graphics Inc said it completed the sale of its Newport Beach Art Supply Center to Standard Brands Paint Co's <SBP> Art Store unit. Terms were not disclosed. Bishop also said it has opened a new sales and service office in Irvine, Calif.
Reuter
